processing_rule: Check if the cell traces for the enodeb and cell which mised the KPI indicate security failures. If a sufficient percentage of those failures are related to the failed security setup - mention that as a possible cause and provide details of the percentages. Suggest further analysis of the individual phones which failed the security setup.
severity_determination_rule: If the eRAB success rate is below 95% rate the incident as high severity, otherwise it's a low severity incident
author: Jack Smith (smith@example.com), Jane Lee (lee@example.com)
